Summarize: It is not faster to better than the PS3 or 360.
PS3 is WAY WAY more superior, I KNOW because I HAVE a 360 AND PS3 and compared them both PS3 is obviosly better than 360 and wii.
MLB 2K9 for the Wii isn't a great baseball game, but superior controls and animation make it a bit better than its 360 and PS3 siblings.
You fanboyz jump at any opportunity (even at the peril of going off on some far tangent), to extol the virtues of the PS3, even if that means making sure everyone knows the PS3 can surf porn better and easier than the Wii.
None, WII U isn't next gen. 8 years ago consoles ruled over PC but then manufactures figured out how to deal with architecure better and now even GPU's are 30x times faster processors than PS3 and xbox.
The bad: Reportedly reacts slightly slower than PS3 with Move, though still faster than Wii, and currently the smallest library with only 17 games currently available.
But the PS3 was faster than the Xbox 360, which was faster than the Wii.
You could see the Wii was inferior to the 360/Ps3.
In many ways the Wii is inferior to Xbox 360 and PS3.
hello no wii has the worst graphics its worse than ps3 but better than xbox360.wii and xbox360 wont have a chance against ps3 .
You get better online for a price, its notably smoother and downloads are much faster than on PS3 you also get gears of war, alan wake, minecraft.

Summarize: Roku's Amazon app is much better, but of course Roku is notoriously lacking a YouTube app and a few others like Vudu.
Amazon made it easier to buy than it was to steal it and sites like Pandora and YouTube made it easier to sample music before we bought it.
But, despite the advertising in Twitch's videos and the revenue from subscribers, user-generated content has typically proved harder to monetize than professional content, which means the Amazon trend of investors waiting to see any significant returns will likely continue, Re/Code posits.
As a rapidly growing video site that has generated more web traffic than Facebook and Hulu in past months, Twitch will give Amazon greater scale to compete for ad dollars with the Google-owned YouTube, the world's biggest online video destination by far.
The uptime promises of Rackspace are better than Amazon .
The combination Twitch+YouTube looked great on paper - much better than Amazon+Twitch.
YouTube will have better demographics than Amazon for this service, but a less substantial offering.
Sure, against home video and cable VOD these numbers are weak, but they're already better than Amazon, Vudu, Playstation and aren't that far off from iTunes based on my personal, first-hand knowledge of how like titles have performed on those platforms.
I will upload a TON of video from this on my YouTube site that will allow you to see the quality (or lack of quality) far better than Amazon allows given its limits.
If you're disappointed that I didn't review the gameplay then it's only because I can't compete with YouTube videos, which will give you a better idea about gameplay mechanics than all Amazon reviews combined.

output:
Amazon and YouTube are both popular online platforms, but they offer different types of content and services. 

Some argue that Amazon Video has weaker numbers compared to other platforms and has limitations on video quality. On the other hand, YouTube is the largest online video destination and is praised for its demographics, giving it an edge in ad competition. 

In terms of app availability, Amazon has an edge in some cases, as it has a better app for Roku. However, YouTube is more widely used and provides a more substantial offering. 

There are also arguments that Amazon's trend of investors waiting for significant returns may continue due to the difficulty of monetizing user-generated content. While the combination of Twitch and YouTube looked great on paper, Amazon's purchase of Twitch has given it greater scale to compete with Google-owned YouTube for ad dollars. 

Overall, Amazon and YouTube serve different purposes and cater to different markets. Depending on your needs and preferences, one may be more suitable than the other.

Summarize: If were going to lose a game its at Dartmouth because Dartmouth is better than Harvard.
Dartmouth finished with 120 points, seven better than SCSU, with Harvard third (74).
But even so , Dartmouth contributes far greater dollar amounts than Harvard to almost all of its employees' pension plans - including highly paid faculty.
In contrast, Yale, Dartmouth and Princeton, which usually boast greater participation rates than Harvard, suffered a decline this year, according to data Clifton received a few months ago.
(Note, Dartmouth is an IVY, I just place it in this lower category because it is easier to get into than Yale, Harvard, and the other top tier IVYs.)
No matter how strong this backfield may appear on paper, little may be expected from it if the line does not show to better advantage than it did against the Army and Dartmouth.
Yale head coach Chris Gobrecht said Dartmouth plays a faster game than Harvard, ensuring that the Yale faithful will see two very different styles of games at Lee Amphitheater this weekend.
The official Class of 2009 website includes a prominent link to the website of Buzzflood , a group designed to reassure its founders that Dartmouth really isn't a worse school than Harvard or Yale.
Dartmouth handled the pressure better than Harvard at the outset, taking a 2-0 lead and a 17-3 shot advantage in the first period, but the teams played evenly for the rest of the night.
Theoretically, Dartmouth's swimming team should be about twenty points better than Harvard when the two squads clash Saturday at 4 p.m. in the I.A.B. Dartmouth downed Cornell 52-42 last weekend, and Cornell lost by only three points to mighty Yale last December.
Senior Mason Brunnick led the pack and touched the wall in a decisive 9:28.86, over thirty seconds faster than the closest Cornell or Dartmouth swimmer.
Heck, talk with folks in Ohio or Indiana or Michigan and they'll claim UMich is a better school than Dartmouth, and a lot of them think NYU is a state school.
A sweep this weekend would put them 1 point behind Harvard for second, and move them to no worse than a tie with Dartmouth.
Harvard shot better than 55 percent for the game while outrebounding Dartmouth, 36-27, stealing 11 balls and blocking 10 shots.
Harvard crossed the line at 6:03.607, well ahead of second-place Yale at 6:07.967, which was over a second faster than third place Dartmouth.
I really need all the info I can get and know almost nothing, a lot of prejudices and mis-info along the lines: like Harvard better than Yale or Princetown, heard Dartmouth is a bit racist and Brown not so good.
Of course, I've got to point out that Cornell and Harvard, who are currently occupying the bottom two rungs of the Ivy League column after only one game, both sport better overall records than the two co-leaders, Yale and Dartmouth--so there.
output:
Dartmouth and Harvard are two prestigious universities that are often compared for their academic excellence and sports teams. 

In terms of athletics, some argue that Dartmouth is better than Harvard in certain sports, while others say that Harvard outperforms Dartmouth in certain games. However, these arguments are based on personal opinions and highly subject to change depending on the season or current events. 

Regarding pensions and financial contributions, Dartmouth is noted for contributing greater dollar amounts to almost all of its employees' pension plans. However, this has little to do with the quality of education and is more about the university's policies and practices. 

Overall, comparing Dartmouth and Harvard in terms of academic excellence is a complex issue that cannot be boiled down to a simple argument. While some may claim that Dartmouth is easier to get into than Harvard, this is subjective and depends on the program and applicant pool. Additionally, some may hold certain prejudices or misinformation about the universities.

Ultimately, the choice between Dartmouth and Harvard depends on personal preferences and priorities. It's important to do research on specific programs and faculties as well as considering factors such as location, campus culture, and financial aid options.

input:
Summarize: Reagan was far, far greater than Kennedy!
The Reagan Doctrine enjoys even better technologies for defense than President Kennedy had in 1962.
For conservatives and Republicans , no one fits that bill better than President Ronald Reagan .
But the point is, Reagan was better than the Dems and even Bush, with his education pact with Kennedy, was better than the Dems.
Reagan faced an even greater worry than Kennedy - that he was a scripted movie actor who couldn't be trusted with war and peace.
Reagan understood and respected the power of his words, and he understood better than anyone since FDR (yes, better than Kennedy) the power of presidential discourse in making great things possible.
Reagan understood, better than any president this side of John Kennedy , that people's perceptions of his conduct were as important as what he was actually doing.
Sandra Day O'Connor was a brilliant choice by President Reagan -- a surprise -- never as popular with the conservatives as Antonin Scalia, but far better than Anthony Kennedy.
It was the GOP of Mitt Romney, circa 1994, when he ran for U.S. senator in Massachusetts as a pro-choice, anti-Reagan Republican who said he'd protect gay rights better than incumbent Democrat Ted Kennedy.
Indeed, Obama may be doing Reagan one better, as nominating Kagan presents the possibility of getting two liberal equivalents to Kennedy rather than just one, as getting even a mainstream liberal confirmed in a closely divided Senate will be difficult.
Ted Kennedy would have been a much better president than Reagan or Carter.
In 1964, Democratic President Kennedy's tax cuts represented 8.8 percent of the budget-far greater than even the Bush or Reagan tax cuts.
Oh, and lest we not forget that Kennedy and Johnson had farm better job creation than Reagan.
In the Reagan administration the top marginal rate was cut to 28 percent, and the cuts were phased in slower than the Kennedy cuts.
What Kennedy could do better than any president in my lifetime-even Reagan-was deliver a speech that expressed America's ideals and reinforced his audience's belief in them.
Kennedy, LBJ, Carter and Clinton were far superior fiscal managers than Nixon, Reagan, Bush I and Bush II.
Like them or not, FDR, Kennedy and Truman had a greater impact on the direction and climate in America than any so called conservative President in American History other than Ronald Reagan.
We felt it before, in the idealism of John F. Kennedy calling us to serve a cause greater than ourselves, and in the strength of Ronald Reagan calling for a wall to be torn down.
Lincoln united a nation divided, Roosevelt lifted a people when hope had run out, Kennedy inspired a generation to serve a cause greater than one's self and to literally reach for the stars, Reagan brought peace and freedom through strength and resolve.
output:
Reagan and Kennedy are both former presidents of the United States and have had an impact on the country's history and politics. 

Many arguments are made on Reagan's achievements, stating that he was a great president, who understood and respected the power of his words and who was great at defending the country. Some also argue that he was better than the Democrats and better than Anthony Kennedy. 

However, there are also arguments in favor of Kennedy's presidency and character. Some claim that he could deliver speeches better than any president and that he inspired a generation to serve a cause greater than oneself. Some even argue that he would have been a better president than Reagan or Carter. 

There are also comparisons made between the policies of the two presidents. For example, Kennedy's tax cuts were greater than even the Bush or Reagan tax cuts, and he managed the fiscal situation better than Nixon, Reagan, Bush I, and Bush II. 

Ultimately, both presidents had an impact on the country and its people, and their legacies continue to be debated and discussed today.

Making things even worse is fact that if Intel sticks to their usual tradition, buyers of their OEMed drives will have to wait slightly longer for firmware revisions than buyers of their Intel-branded brethren.
Many of the tests are heavy on the read performance and the Kingston drive really shows its strengths, but not better than the second generation Intel X25-M drives.
Starting at the bottom with the 512B results, the Mach Extreme has solid write performance - not quite as fast as the smaller Intel drive but a whopping 50% faster than the Kingston.
Switching our view from average latency to peak response times, we found similar max latency from the Micron P400m and Samsung SSD 840 Pro, which came in below the Intel DC S3700 but better than the Kingston E100.
Still it was faster than Intel X25-M.
The first and faster group includes the SSDs from Intel: the X25-E is expectedly better than its cousin, especially at writing.
The array is also faster than the single drive on small data blocks, but Intel SSDs are generally superior in this respect.
Performance is very close and Kingston have better S.M.A.R.T-features than Intel.
Having faster RAM means you need a faster CPU to take advantage of anything higher than 1600-1866 on newer Intel processors.
The 512K 8MB write test shows that the new SSDNow V comes in more than 7MB/s faster than the older Intel X25-M.
It's because the Kingston RAM is faster than stock and the integrated Intel GPU uses the system RAM.
It differs for the better from the majority of SandForce-based SSDs, almost matching the performance of the Intel 520 which is superior to its counterparts thanks to its exclusive firmware.
The only unobvious thing is that the X-25V array is so much faster than the single SSDs from Intel.
Write performance is admittedly more modest at 113MB/s, but it's still quicker than the Intel drive.
output:
Intel and Kingston are both manufacturers of computer hardware components, with a focus on Solid State Drives (SSDs).  The performance and quality of these SSDs can vary based on factors such as customized firmware, software provided, read and write performance, latency, and compatibility with other components. 

Intel is known to have highly customized firmware and software, and their SSD Toolbox software has been praised for its superiority to Kingston's offerings. Intel's drives have also been noted for their performance in read-heavy tests, their ability to handle small data blocks, and their faster write performance. Some Intel drives have also been noted as superior to Kingston's offerings, although others have been noted as slower. 

Kingston, on the other hand, has been noted for its strong read performance and its strengths in tests that are heavy on read performance. Some models of Kingston SSDs have also been praised for their S.M.A.R.T. features. However, Kingston's write performance has been noted as more modest in some tests, and in other benchmarks, their drives have been outperformed by Intel SSDs. 

Ultimately, the choice between Intel and Kingston SSDs depends on individual needs and preferences, and it may be advisable to compare specific models and their performance in different benchmarks and use cases.

input:
Summarize: But hockey is an infinitely faster game than lacrosse.
I think rowing and hockey (men's and women's) are better examples than lacrosse, though.
From my point of view, my son's lacrosse bag actually smells worse than my hockey bag did.
...Helps the environment by: carpooling...If not a hockey player he would be: teacher... Miscellaneous: better lacrosse player than hockey player growing up.
Hockey is much safer than many sports, including, but not limited to: speed skiing, all forms of race car driving, pelota, lacrosse (similar to hockey, but virtually no padding), & football.
The goal can be used for hockey, soccer (obviously a LOT smaller than regulation, but better than nothing), lacrosse, handball, field hockey, etc. which is pretty cool.
Dumb debate.It's like making a debate that hockey is better then lacrosse and rugby is ebtter then football.None is better then the other they are different sports.
I'm not sure lax will fare any better than hockey for the general sports fan on TV.
Taking time for a quick interview after the game, McDonald postponed a post-game shower, not the best idea given that he admits that his lacrosse equipment smells far worse than his hockey stuff.
In upstate New York, and with a significant Canadian student base already, hockey certainly serves that mission far better than lacrosse or track and field will.
He can fire the ball at up to 111 miles an hour, faster than a slap shot in hockey and only slightly slower than an archer's hurtling arrow.
Hell, lacrosse is growing faster than hockey at this point.
Yeah...controlling the puck in hockey is significantly harder than cradling in lacrosse.
And nothing is better than a hockey fighter.
Many also cite lacrosse as being much safer than football and hockey with far fewer occurrences of concussions being reported.
A lacrosse shot can go faster than the average hockey slapshot - and usually is fired from closer range.
People keep making the claim that lacrosse is safer than football or hockey and I just can't get behind those sentiments.
What has resulted is a lot of confusion, and a lacrosse helmet that seems better designed for hockey than anything else.
These days, the Iroquois play box lacrosse - a faster, shorter and rougher version of the game that resembles hockey more than anything else.
Personally, I think of lacrosse as better than soccer, but not quite up to the level of football or hockey.
output:
Hockey and lacrosse are both popular sports, with their own strengths and differences.

Some argue that hockey is an infinitely faster game, while others find it much safer compared to other sports. Additionally, hockey is seen as a sport that serves a specific mission in certain areas, has great fighters, and shares equipment and a goal with other sports. 

On the other hand, some prefer lacrosse and find it growing faster, being safer than football and hockey, and having benefits for the environment. Lacrosse is seen as a rough and faster version of the game that resembles hockey, and requires a different level of skill in controlling the ball. 

Ultimately, the choice between hockey and lacrosse is a matter of personal preference. Both have their own unique features and require different forms of skills and strategy.

input:
Summarize: Apple has always maintained the Mac processors, starting with the Motorola 68000s in the original, were technically superior to and much faster than their Intel contemporaries.
Apple needs a quad core A7 and iOS 7, otherwise Apple is pulling off the same lie that G4/G5 was superior to Intel & AMD computer cpu's last decade from 2001-2005.
Each new Apple was faster/better, then they shifted from the PowerPC to the Intel.
Maybe Apple was a better run company (than say, Commodore), but Macs were not superior computing platforms until OSX met the Intel chip - and that was a long time coming.
That what I've written above is so bleedingly obvious to me and yet so vehemently derived by many an Apple fan ( Usually more so by the olden school OS 9 is better than OSX and Power PC was always faster than Intel crowd of fact deniers).
new M4NG0s are no faster than the reddest freshest apple even slower than pineapple, now that I think about it.
The same way Apple told everyone that power pc chips were faster and superior, when they were developing an intel os all along!
Yes, I have long known that Apple memory and cpu access technology is faster and cleaner than the equivalent Microsoft OS no matter what the hardware, as evidenced by Apple lately using Intel and Unix OS.
2009 - I have had so many arguments with people stating that Apple deliberately geared Mac OSÂ X 10.5 Leopard to perform much better on Intel machines so as to pull people away from the PowerPC platform.
Apple needs to find a better graphics solution than the HD nastiness offered by Intel.
I installed an 80gb Intel X25-M and am really happy with the results - apps open MUCH faster and OSX boots much quicker than with the original 200gb/5,400rpm offering from Apple/Hitachi.
A second reason: it turns out that Intel chips are faster and better than PowerPC chips after all, despite decades of vehement Apple fanboy arguments to the contrary.
The G4 processor used in the Apple notebooks is inferior to any recent Intel notebook processor.
And no, apple branded SSDs dont count, they're inferior to the offerings from Intel, OCZ, etc. .
Dunford also claims that battery life for the new Atom chips is better than for the Apple or Qualcomm parts.
Apple said it was 10% slower than the Intel processors on this test.
dude arm rocks, a6 is great cpu with better than cortex a9 ram controller apple has money to make cpu much faster than risc/arm from ps3!
Apple sure can't make it any easier than using normal Intel chipsets.
Bay Trail Processors are already faster than Apple A7 CPUs.
apple didn't claimed running linux on powerpc was faster than linux on intel.
output:
Apple and Intel are both well-known technology companies, but they have some differences and similarities.

Some argue that Apple's previous processors were technically superior and faster than their Intel counterparts, but others claim that the shift to Intel was necessary for Macs to become superior computing platforms. Moreover, some argue that Apple deliberately geared Mac OS X towards Intel machines to pull people away from the PowerPC platform. 

In terms of components, some criticize Apple's graphics solution and SSDs and prefer Intel's offerings. However, others claim that Apple's memory and CPU access technology is faster and cleaner than the equivalent on Microsoft OS, even when using Intel and Unix OS. 

In terms of performance, some argue that Intel chips are faster and better than PowerPC chips, while others argue that ARM CPUs are better. 

Ultimately, the decision of which company is better may depend on your personal preferences and needs. For example, Apple has a reputation for well-designed hardware and software, while Intel has a reputation for producing high-quality processors.

Overall, the comparison between Apple and Intel depends on various factors such as the type of hardware, software used, and personal preference.

input:
Summarize: Basketball moves faster than volleyball!!
With the exception of women's beach volleyball there is no greater sport than basketball and I am a basketball junkie.
We dive harder than basketball players, we contort our bodies more, and everyone I know would rather play in spandex.
You have to remember that Budinger wasn't playing competitive basketball until his Sophomore of high school, he was considered a better volleyball player than basketball player coming out of high school .
I think I like the baseball and basketball aesthetic better than football, hockey, volleyball, tennis, golf, cricket, rugby, and others sports.
I think I like the baseball and basketball aesthetic better than football, hockey, volleyball, tennis, golf, cricket, rugby, and other sports.
" There is probably no better spot for the younger Donovan to learn how to coach or run a basketball team than under the wing of a future hall of fame coach.
By the way, basketball players (male and female) have to move a lot faster and cover a lot more distance than Volleyball players yet they wear their spandex shorts UNDER their baggy/loose uniform.
Soccer is a contact sport and just as sweaty as basketball, though the better players do handle the ball more than they do in volleyball.
I have never seen Herauf play basketball but I hear she is a great basketball player--even better than VB and she is a GREAT volleyball player (Player of the year in fact.)
All in all, Football (like Basketball, like Waterpolo) is inferior to Rugby Union or Volleyball, because one can bring the family to follow the latter group more or less everywhere around the world.
In grade 12 I realized that my love for volleyball was greater than my love for basketball so I started to talk to coaches about volleyball scholarships.
Start with a volleyball(smaller and lighter than a basketball), then take a soccer ball(nearly same size, but less weight) and then start doing it with a basketball.
For some reason, long legged girls in volleyball look so much better than long legged women in basketball.
"Volleyball clicked for me faster than basketball did," said the 5-foot-10 left side, who competed in the Cats 16U girls club volleyball tournament in Brandon over the weekend.
She served for a year as volleyball and softball coach at UW-Superior and served as the university's women's basketball coach.
There have been many examples of this in Beijing, from basketball players to female sailors, but none worse than the other day at the women's beach volleyball competition.
The spandex has a better chance not to be pulled off or ride up in the event of a slide across a gymnasium floor than looser shorts, such as basketball shorts.
The versatile Allison played some soccer and volleyball for the Blue Devils, but eventually she decided she was better at basketball than soccer, and volleyball had too little physical contact for the 6-foot-2 specimen.
Jen's volleyball career started in 5th grade when she was approached by a club coach and saw aspects to the sport she liked better than the physical nature of basketball.
output:
Basketball and volleyball are two popular sports with their own unique characteristics and fan bases.

Some argue that basketball moves faster than volleyball and requires players to cover more distance. Basketball is also considered by some to be a superior sport to others. Others argue that volleyball requires harder dives, more contortion, and better aesthetics with spandex uniforms. 

There are also arguments about individual skills in each sport. For example, some say that certain players are better at volleyball than basketball. 

Ultimately, the choice of sport is subjective and depends on individual preferences such as physical contact, aesthetic preferences, and passion. Both sports have their own unique charm and culture, and can provide players and fans with a great deal of fun and enjoyment.

input:
Summarize: The laptops made by Sony, Panasonic and others are superior to what is currently available from Apple, including the new Intel Macs.
The screen resolution is impressive but after reading so many rave reviews, I was disappointed that it wasn't any faster than my five-year-old Sony all-in-one desktop PC.
I suppose they're aiming to find a way to waste more money and bomb harder than the PS3... if Sony can outdo themselves this time, they'll never have to make another console again!
Not only does the Sony offer superior performance, thanks to its Intel Core 2 Duo processor, but we like its overall design better.
Although Sony and IBM are working together on a super-advanced processor theoretically faster than anything Intel will have at the time of release, the reality is that competing with Intel (and AMD) chips is nearly impossible to do.
Not only that, Windows Vista ran a lot faster on my Mac than did on my Sony... still, I don't think I'll be using Windows again except for College from time to time.
The CPU performance of the AMD APU hardware on Sony PS4 and Microsoft XBox720 it's on par if not slower than Intel Core2Quad Q9650 which is rather oudated, a 4-5 years old CPU.
The Sony Vaio E-Series -VPC-EH2N1E is a superior quality black shade laptop that comes with 2nd generation Intel Processor to deliver powerful performance.
Outperforming all but the Sony VAIO VPC-Z12V9E/X, software opens and runs far faster than any Intel Core i3 and i5-based machines, making it a great choice for frequent and demanding use.
I'm still waiting for a decent Nano netbook, for now i use Sony Vaio T17GP which is far better than any netbook (although being 10.6 inch) but breaks my #1 rule - "never use Intel".
Off the top of my head, if all you want to do is 'mundane' stuff, I'd say the faster processor might deliver you better performance than the separate graphics card in the Sony.
It is 10X faster than my other tablet ... the video/movies/tv shows are in HD LED - better quality than my 46" Sony TV ... The battery fully charges in less than 4 hours and it will stay charged for 2-3 days depending how much I use.
Much Faster than my 6 year old Sony Vaio PC.
Experience superior computing performance with Sony Vaio E 14133 Laptop.
Experience superior computing performance with Sony VAIO SVE-15135 Laptop.
Experience superior computing performance with Sony VAIO SVE-15137 Laptop.
The computer is much faster than my family's Sony Vaio which runs Window Vista.
The N56V finished in 4 minutes and 22 seconds, more than 20 seconds faster than the HP 8560W, and almost a minute faster than the Sony VAIO F. .
Speaker volume is excellent (better than my Sony Vaio FRV 26).
Lenovo 's customer service is good, much better than Sony, Acer or HP.
output:
Both Sony and Intel are popular brands in the technology industry, providing a range of products for consumers. 

Some arguments praise the performance and computing power of Sony laptops, which boast Intel processors. However, others express disappointment with slower speeds, or negative views on other Sony products. 

In terms of Sony vs. Intel itself, some argue that Sony's collaboration with IBM can produce super-advanced processors that may exceed anything Intel can offer, while others claim that competing with Intel and AMD is nearly impossible. 

Overall, the choice between Sony and Intel may depend on individual needs and preferences. Some users appreciate the quality and speed of Sony laptops with Intel processors, while others argue that other brands may offer better value or performance.

Summarize: Timber is strong, light and reliable making timber construction simpler and safer than steel or concrete construction.
Timber is strong, light and reliable, making timber construction on site simpler and safer than concrete or steel construction.
While not conventionally used in trailers, timber is cheaper and lighter than steel sheet and for me at least is much easier to work with.
A proposed structural system would use approximately 70 percent timber to build tall buildings as an environmentally friendlier alternative to steel and concrete.
Transportation of timber pieces is also much easier than large tubular steel sections.
For builders, timber was often a cheaper and lighter-weight alternative for house frames than steel.
In a carbon-restrained world, timber is better than steel and concrete.
"A timber building, typically lighter than a brick, concrete or steel building, therefore induces lower earthquake loads."

Modern timber structure holds many virtues in the fields of construction, such as energy-saving, green, aesthetics, ect, superior to concrete and steel bridge.
Steel ties are lighter in weight than concrete and able to stack in compact bundles unlike timber.
Steel performs much better than timber in an earthquake because its light weight .
The steel home construction method is a far superior structure to timber.

output:
Timber and steel are two materials commonly used in construction, each with its own advantages and disadvantages.

Timber is lightweight, reliable, and strong, making it a popular choice for construction. It is also cheaper and easier to work with than steel. Additionally, timber is considered a more environmentally friendly alternative to steel and concrete when building tall buildings. The transportation of timber pieces is also easier than large tubular steel sections.

On the other hand, steel is stronger and more durable than timber, making it a better choice in earthquake-prone areas. It is also considered a newer and more advanced technology and is often cheaper than timber. Steel is also a safer option than timber in certain circumstances, such as temporary adjustable steel heads for builders. Galvanized steel is also noted for its durability compared to timber and concrete. Additionally, steel is a stronger and tougher material than timber and will outlast it in certain marine applications.

Ultimately, the choice between timber and steel depends on the context and specific needs of the project. While timber may be easier to work with and transport, steel is better-suited for earthquake-prone areas and has greater durability and sustainability in certain applications.

Summarize: Powder Coated Aluminum Battery Cover is lighter weight, quicker and easier to remove, and better looking than the OEM stamped steel version.
Aluminum boats are faster, lighter, easier to operate, and easier to work with than steel.
SmartPipe â„¢ modular aluminum piping is a superior compressed air delivery system designed for higher flows, low pressure differentials,Â better air quality and faster, easier installation than copper or steel pipe.
Their aluminum backplate makes them lighter and dissipate heat quicker than a steel backplate (cooler brakes help reduce brake fade).
Aluminum is much lighter and easier to use than steel.
All aluminum trailers are lighter therefore better, than steel trailers .
Beyond price, aluminum is much lighter and easier to handle than tool steel.
Aluminum rims are lighter and stop much faster than steel, especially when it's wet.
Aluminum is lighter and easier to handle than steel cylinders and do not rust.
Plastic is cheap, aluminum is way easier and faster to machine than steel.
If you want a pan with a slightly faster response than copper with better retention (and much lighter in weight), but not quite as even, you can get that in a good aluminum/stainless pan.
Tubular steel is lighter in weight and easier to handle than cast aluminum, and is more durable than regular aluminum.
Tubular steel is lighter in weight and easier to handle than cast aluminum, and it's more durable than regular aluminum.
The darker steel horseshoes are sturdier, heavier and less expensive than the lighter, faster, more fragile aluminum plates.
The continuing advances in steel tubing has permitted Hugo to make steel bikes lighter than ever before and with ride characteristics better than aluminum.
I've found that steel moulds tend to cast better quality bullets easier than aluminum moulds.
Steel shafts can tolerate greater amounts of torque better than aluminum shafts, depending on wall thickness and tube diameter.
Steel is said to have a smoother ride because it absorbs vibration better than aluminum, but frame material is going to have far less of an effect than tires and frame geometry.
The Fr8 and Gr8 also have heavier Chro-mo steel frames which tend to ride smoother than the typical lighter aluminum bike frames that most bikes sold in the U.S. are made from.
Mauviel M'heritage M150c Copper & Stainless Steel Saucepan with Lid, Cast Iron Handle : Professional and home chefs everywhere applaud the superior performance of Mauviel copper cookware that conducts heat 2 times faster than aluminum and 10 times faster than stainless-steel alone.
output:
Aluminum and steel are two commonly used materials with distinct properties that suit different purposes.

Aluminum is lighter, easier to work with, and often better looking. It is also applicable in delivered air systems, where it is better for higher flows, low-pressure differentials, and better air quality. Aluminum backplates, for example, cool brakes more effectively than steel, and aluminum rims stop much faster than steel, especially when wet. Aluminum cylinders do not rust, making them lighter and easier to handle than steel cylinders. In addition, it is considered easier and faster to machine than steel.

On the other hand, steel is more durable than aluminum in many cases because it tolerates greater amounts of torque better than aluminum. Steel tubing is said to provide a smoother ride compared to aluminum's ability to absorb vibrations. For example, steel bikes can be lighter than ever before while retaining better ride characteristics than aluminum. Steel is also used extensively in horseshoes and cookware.

Therefore, the choice to use aluminum or steel depends on the desired objectives, with aluminum being more applicable in situations requiring lighter weight and aesthetics while steel is more applicable for durability and tolerance of great stress.

Summarize: perl/python/php can be used for automating tasks and in many cases are better suited than bash for more complicated tasks .
Python is faster than bash usually, so I think I'll just adjust it.
Since Python supports objects it's easier to write complex scripts than with Bash.
This is still not better than what python has to offer, but its better than what you presented.
A simple Python script is likely to be faster than anything you can do in bash.
Python is about 80% faster than bash because it is byte compiled while base is interperated.
Python, Ruby and even PHP handle this sort of thing much better than Bash.
Python has good XML parsers, so portage could parse it on its own, probably faster than parsing BASH strings.
I find Python easier to program in than Bash; you don't have to deal with hordes of escaping scenarios, for one.
Python or even PHP might be a better way to go, if your looking for something other than perl/bash.
Bash scripting is more easier then python :) .
For 2nd, bash was nearly 2 times faster than python.
For 1st, bash was nearly 3 times faster than python.
Bash : sometimes it's easier to write a script in bash rather than in python.
running BASH scripts is slightly lighter than running Perl/Python/whatever scripts on top of BASH.
I would find using Python to do that much harder than using BASH.
I use the Bourne shell for portability, Bash for its greater power than sh (arrays, etc.), ksh when Bash is not available and Python when I need speed and greater power than Bash.
Anything more than a few lines of Bash could be done better in Python.
As my python script seems to be slower than a bash script I want to try a ghc executable now.
If you already have a bash script (or find one via the Google), changing it is usually simpler than porting it to Python.
output:
Python and Bash are both useful programming languages for automating tasks and scripting, but they have some differences in terms of speed, complexity, and suitability for specific tasks.

Some argue that Python is usually faster than Bash, and has better support for complex scripts with objects. Moreover, Python has good XML parsers, and handles certain tasks better than Bash, such as string parsing and array handling. Python is also regarded as easier to program than Bash, and a better choice for certain tasks over Perl or Bash.

On the other hand, some argue that Bash is simpler and easier to write scripts in, and some tasks can be done better and faster in Bash. Moreover, running Bash scripts is considered lighter than running Perl or Python scripts. Some also argue that changing an existing Bash script is usually simpler than porting it to Python. 

Ultimately, the choice between Python and Bash depends on the specific task and personal preferences. Some prefer to use both languages depending on the need for speed, portability, or power. It's also important to consider factors such as familiarity with the language, availability of existing scripts, and compatibility with other tools and systems.

I can get to you with knife inside of 21ft faster than you can react, draw your pistol, and shoot.
In very close quarters combat, pulling out the knife can be faster and more deadly than pulling out the pistol.

The Ginsu Home Surgical Knife Set â„¢ will cut through it faster than Plaxico Burress goes through an ammo clip with his 9mm pistol.

it was very much frowned upon to carry a fighting knife, with the idea that it was alwayd better to have a bachup pistol than a knife, or to use a silencer rather than a knife.

Summarize: I am able to get the knife out a little quicker than my concealed pistol.
You can deploy a knife much faster than you can deploy a pistol, and this knife, when deployed, is very dangerous.
Seems to me that a knife would be better than your average pistol (though you could pistol whip them, I suppose).
I can control a knife in my hand better than on the end of a pistol.
I can get to you with knife inside of 21ft faster than you can react, draw your pistol, and shoot.
In very close quarters combat, pulling out the knife can be faster and more deadly than pulling out the pistol.
I can have the knife deployed faster, and more reliably with one hand than I can un-holster a concealed pistol.
The Ginsu Home Surgical Knife Set â„¢ will cut through it faster than Plaxico Burress goes through an ammo clip with his 9mm pistol.
I know the old adage about a knife being faster than a pistol at close quarters, but I also know the old adage about bringing a knife to a gunfight.
it was very much frowned upon to carry a fighting knife, with the idea that it was alwayd better to have a bachup pistol than a knife, or to use a silencer rather than a knife.
Johnnie's hand curved up with the pistol; faster than a snake striking, faster than the knife.
Pistol: The pistol is better than a knife but it is still very weak.

-Have the silenced pistol ready, its much better than the knife .
It's the sort of pistol that falls under being better than a knife.
For some jobs a pistol is better than a rifle, and a little knife better than a bazooka (but not many).
-Have the silenced pistol ready, its much better than the knife -Take everyone out on the boat, with your pistol its not too hard.
Last Words This Pistol is better than the Combat Knife but again should be only used as a last resort weapon.
Seems that the pistol is a last ditch weapon in any case, and having any would be better than your knife.
Developed to be the right blade for any situation, the Gerber Kukri Machete & Instant AO Clip Folder Combo is superb for any occasion where a superior quality knife is the way to succeed.
output:
Knives and pistols are both weapons that serve different purposes depending on the situation and user preferences. Some arguments favor knives over pistols in certain instances, while others argue for the superiority of pistols.

According to some, knives have faster deployment times and can be controlled better in hand. Furthermore, knives can be more deadly and dangerous up close. However, others argue that pistols are better in specific situations since they can be more powerful at a distance, and easier to use in a gunfight. 

Ultimately, the choice between a knife and a pistol depends on individual preferences, the specific scenario, and perhaps the availability of different weapons. Some argue that carrying both can be useful for a wide range of situations. It is important to note that weapons should always be used responsibly and with caution.

input:
Summarize: Amazon promised that Fire TV would be faster and easier to use than Apple TV, Google's Chromecast or Roku's streaming video device.
In a previous Kindle commercial , Amazon made the point that the Kindle was easier to read in direct sunlight, is smaller, lighter and less expensive than Apple's iPad too.
There's been no rumors to suggest this, but if it were to do so it would be better-featured, lighter, and thinner than the Amazon Fire.
Amazon has a simpler and quicker process for publishing an ebook than Apple, but Ars "incorrectly predicted the publication lag time," meaning Ars is missing out on the critical first wave of nerdy excitement.
And since Amazon's download fee (15 cents per megabyte) is likely to be greater than 5%, that means that B&N is paying better than Amazon, although not as good as Apple.
Last week, Amazon unleashed its new video-streaming device the Amazon Fire TV (or fireTV, as the label reads), which the company says would be faster and easier to use than competing devices like the Google Chromecast Apple TV and the Roku products.
Amazon builds a nicer cage than Apple does.
Generally, both Amazon and Google are superior to Apple in managing recommendations.
Still, I can't quite fathom the P/E for Amazon being 290 times greater than that for Apple.
This Is The One Metric Where Amazon Is Vastly Superior To Apple And Samsung .
That means anyone can patent anything patentable, much better than the current bullshit expensive system with faster lanes for amazon or other big fish.
Apple [is] growing revenues faster than Amazon, growing earnings, and growing estimates.
Apple is Superior to all, Amazon .
Having said all this - I am now wondering if Amazon - a company I wish I owned isn't a better short in conjunction with a paired long-position in Apple.
No, Amazon is far worse than Apple.
However, many reviews are against buying the $10 Amazon product as its inferior to that of the original Apple product.
They also claimed therefore the Amazon version was inferior to the Apple App Store because of this and tarnished the name.
Of course, Amazon wants to rival (or worse) Roku and Apple.
I've already reported Apple retail is growing sales faster than Amazon.
Apple are bad, but no worse than Amazon with the Kindle.
output:
Amazon and Apple are two tech giants known for their innovative products and services. 

According to some users, Amazon's Fire TV is faster and easier to use than Apple TV and other competing devices. Additionally, Amazon's Kindle is easier to read in direct sunlight, smaller, lighter, and less expensive than Apple's iPad. Amazon also has a simpler and quicker process for publishing ebooks than Apple. However, some drawbacks are mentioned, such as the quality of their $ product being inferior to the original Apple product, and tarnishing of the name due to their app store's policies. 

On the other hand, some argue that Apple is superior to Amazon in managing recommendations, growing revenues, earnings, and estimates, and overall superiority. Additionally, Apple's retail sales are growing faster than Amazon. Still, there are those who criticize Apple and suggest that shorting Amazon may be a good strategy when paired with a long position in Apple. 

Overall, it depends on personal preferences and needs whether Amazon or Apple is the better choice.

input:
Summarize: I adore any soup, but what goes better with soup than some homemade crusty warm bread.
While my wonderful soup was cooking, I decided what better to go with soup than homemade bread.
Grey skies and a bubbling pot of soup go better together than bread and butter.
It's perfect for soup night, holds up well to grilled sandwiches a couple days later and is lighter than most whole wheat bread recipes.
To go with all that soup you'll be making, there is nothing better than homemade bread.
i agree that pasta soup does taste better than bread... hopefully your boyboy could recover asap... .
Not only was it much, much better than Gazpacho, it was also the best soup Jane had ever had.
I can dip a saltine cracker in my soup, or nibble on corn muffins too, but nothing tastes better with soup than bread.
LA GUARDIA ASSAILS VETERANS' EVICTION; He Wires to Hoover That Soup Is Better Than Tear Bombs, Bread Cheaper Than Bullets.
I love crunchies like this to nibble on with a drink or with soup... so much better than bread.
Much nicer then my boring pea soup dumplings :) .
A sandwiche, bread, cheese, is easier than soup!
There's gotta be something better than cabbage soup!
It looks better than the Olive Garden soup!
Day-old or slightly stale bread held up better in our Tuscan Bread Soup recipe than fresh bread.
Pop some bread in your bread machine because nothing goes better with a warm soup than warm, homemade bread!
Picking mold off the soft side of bread is easier than heating a can of soup.
We ate ours with some garlic bread because nothing goes better with a garlicky soup than garlic bread!
Don't wait to order them in restaurants; they're much easier to make at home than a pot of soup.
Wintertime lunch doesn't get much better than a big bowl of hot soup.
output:
Soup and bread are popular culinary elements that can be consumed together or separately.

Many people argue that nothing goes better with soup than homemade bread, since it complements the flavor and texture of soup. However, some argue that soup itself is better than bread or prefer something else to nibble on, such as crackers or crunchy snacks.

There are also opinions regarding the texture and quality of bread for soup. For example, day-old or slightly stale bread can hold up better in Tuscan Bread Soup recipe than fresh bread, and homemade bread is best when it's crusty and warm. However, some argue that bread and butter are not as good as soup and gray skies together.

Ultimately, the choice between soup and bread depends on personal preferences and context. They can complement each other nicely for a hearty and comforting meal in the winter, or be consumed separately for a lighter meal.

input:
Summarize: The Sigma has faster autofocus but the Tamron had even better IQ than the Nikon 18-200, what a dilemma .
Sigma 17-70 HSM OS + better range than the 18-55 + faster (but not as fast as the Tamron) + 9" min focus - macro use + cheaper than Nikon .
Sigma tries it with better specs instead: the 18-50 DC OS is a bit less than a stop faster throughout the zoom range than Nikon's kit lenses, but also retails at a somewhat higher price of around 180 EUR/200 USD at the time of this review.
The sigma is much faster focusing and better then the Nikon 1.4 g in the center at all of the low apertures.
The Sigma and Tamron are superior to the Nikon, because .
Build quality is superior to Sigma and Tamron and certainly the same or better than canon and nikon equivalents.
I believe Sigma 24-105 has better optics than 24-105 Canon kit or 24-120 Nikon, and superior to 24-85 Nikon kit I own.
You could do worse than go for one of the Sigma 18-250s, though I've not seen a comparative review that says whether the new macro version is much better than the old one, though it is about 25% lighter.
As for faster zooms, Sigma might be better than Nikon, with the 17-50 and the 50-150 f/2.8s.
The zoom action of the Sigma lens is smoother than my Nikon lens.
The Nikon AF-S 80-400mm is slightly lighter and of course better appointed than the Sigma's, although the Sigma was no slouch.
Nikon 10-24 is more useful, better built, faster to focus, easer to manually override AF if needed, sharper and therefore better than Sigma 10-20.
Nikon glass will always be superior to Sigma.
I think most people see Sigma cameras and lenses as inferior to brands like Nikon and Canon.
I could imagine if you would want a lighter and smaller option, the Nikon is better than the Sigma.
My Nikon 14mm-24mm zoom, at 14mm, is clearly superior to a Sigma 14mm f2.8 I have and in my opinion, slightly better than my Nikon 14mm f2.8.
Autofocus slightly faster than Sigma and quiet.
lighter and smaller than the Sigma .
1 stop faster than the Nikon and I like the color rendition better than the Sigma 10-20 which I used to have.
In personal testing I find this lens superior to the Sigma in every way.
output:
Sigma and Nikon are both reputable camera brands that offer high-quality lenses. 

According to users, Sigma lenses have faster autofocus, better range, and better specs, while Nikon lenses are superior in build quality, autofocus speed, and have better optics. Some users also argue that Sigma cameras and lenses are inferior to Nikon and Canon.

It is noted that Sigma lenses are cheaper than their Nikon equivalents and have a smoother zoom action, while Nikon lenses are lighter and better appointed, built better, and have slightly better color rendition. 

Ultimately, the choice between Sigma and Nikon lenses may depend on personal preferences, needs, and the specific lens model being considered. It is recommended to read reviews and do research on specific lenses for a better understanding of their performance and reliability.

input:
Summarize: I must say though that the Motorola is better equipped and nicer to handle than any Nokia I have owned.
But Motorola kept trying to come up with even better products, and its next products weren't any cooler than the Razr, while other makers (including Nokia) soon caught up with cool designs of their own.
This Motorola is lighter than the Nokia I drowned in coffee, though, so it'll be easier for me to hold it.
It's a weird world in which Motorola makes nicer budget hardware than Nokia.
Worse than Motorola, Palm, Siemens, Blackberry, etc.
Frankly, I think Nokia is even worse at understanding software than Samsung or Motorola.
It will suit young people who orient on the trademark and want to have light effects for a little price (they are rather good, inferior to Motorola v80 but the price is less).
I found the sound quality to be worse than my old Motorola Atrix and iPhone 3G.
Slower too than the best Android phones at the price, such as the Motorola Moto G.
Yes, you do have to press a bit harder than on the iPhone or Motorola Cliq XT , but it's not a wretched task.
Ericssons are considered to be easier than Motorola but harder than Nokia to use.
Nokia Cooler Than Motorola, My Mom .
Nokia has a better build than Motorola.
It's far superior to another LTE android (with exception of Motorola droid razr maxx).
It's pretty apparent that the N900's camera is superior to the Motorola Droid's.
Also, Nokia has better brand image than Motorola.
A tad heavy, but no worse than most Motorola clamshells.
Its performance is still worse then pictures taken with Nokia 6600 or Samsung D415 but better then Samsung E715 or Motorola V600.
I'd say the Google-Motorola Deal is worse for the Android Ecosystem than the Microsoft-Nokia deal simply because MS or Nokia can back out of the relationship easier.
These headphones are far superior to the HT-820 Motorola set I' have used for over 2 years.
output:
Motorola and Nokia are two popular mobile phone manufacturers with a varied history of producing high-quality devices. 

Some users argue that Motorola is better equipped and nicer to handle than Nokia and has superior budget hardware, while others argue that Nokia has a better build quality and a better brand image. However, some users criticize Nokia for its inferior software understanding, while others find it easier to use than Motorola. 

In terms of specific products, some users praise Motorola's sound quality, and camera, while others prefer Nokia's performance in terms of camera. Additionally, some users believe that the Google-Motorola deal has negative implications for the Android Ecosystem. 

Ultimately, the choice between Motorola and Nokia may depend on personal preference and specific needs. It may be helpful to research specific models and their features before making a decision.
